com.ephesoft.dcma.batch.service

Class EphesoftContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.batch.service.EphesoftContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Component
public class EphesoftContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements Context, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    The EphesoftContext class is responsible for providing host server information and updating the same information in database. The information provided includes:
    • Host Name e.g., server1
    • Host Heart-beat URL
    • Host server registry entry
    • Other in network server registry entry
    It inserts and updated the host server registry entry in ephesoft database.
    Version:
    1.0
    $LastChangedDate: 2015-02-18 12:12:22 +0530 (Wed, 18 Feb 2015) $
    $LastChangedRevision: 19605 $
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 10-Jun-2013
    See Also:
    Context, ApplicationContextAware

        public static java.lang.String getHostAddress()

        Returns:
        hostName String host name of localhost.

      • getServerRegistry

        public static ServerRegistry getServerRegistry(java.lang.String ipAddress,
                               java.lang.String portNumber,
                               java.lang.String applicationContext)
        Returns the instance of ServerRegistry with respect to ip address, port number and context passed as parameter.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - String ip address of the requested server.
        portNumber - String port number on which the application is running on that server.
        applicationContext - String application context.
        Returns:
        ServerRegistry instance for server.
